name: Joseph Hernandez
text: It was spectacular, it's been 6 years since I've had hungry howies give it a take and it's just like I remember it my childhood flooding back in one bite definitely a place everyone should go

text: This pizza was AMAZING! It was incredibly delicious! My mom she doesn’t like pizza but she loves this one! The staff there is also friendly. Keep up the great work everyone!! You have one loyal customer!!!

text: Great food at a very fair price,i was driving around the are and my family and i were very hungry so we google hungry howies of glendale and it came out there was one just a cople of minutes from where i was. …More

name: Andrew Marquez
text: Ordered Pizza, Howie Bread and Wings.  Pizza is pretty standard so can't complain  (though I only got the original crust).  The bread and wings had a good kick of flavor on it.  Good Stuff!

text: If I could rate it a zero I would. I was delivered the wrong pizza and called back and they offered to replace in another hour. Now the "owner" was a rude POS and says they never received a complaint. I paid $20+ for a pie and bread. If an …More

name: Sylvia Vergil
text: Talk about great customer service, this location opens  at 11 am however, I needed to have the pizza at my office by 11 am they were able to accomidate. Looking forward to tasting the pizza I'm hearing from our employees its top-notch.  Thank you Hungry Howies in Covina
